title: Injury Testing
description: Comprehensive diagnostics to identify the root cause of pain or dysfunction for swift recovery.

consultations.title: Initial Injury Assessment
consultations.details: Thorough evaluation using advanced diagnostics to create a personalized recovery plan.
consultations.idealFor: Athletes or individuals with acute or chronic pain seeking a precise diagnosis.

consultations.title: Rehabilitation Support Package
consultations.details: Weekly therapy sessions, advanced recovery tools, and personalized rehabilitation plans.
consultations.idealFor: Athletes committed to structured recovery with minimal re-injury risk.

title: Performance Testing
description: Evaluate strength, agility, and endurance to optimize training and boost athletic performance.

consultations.title: Performance Baseline Assessment
consultations.details: Full evaluation of physical attributes with a detailed report and training recommendations.
consultations.idealFor: Athletes starting a new training cycle or setting performance goals.

consultations.title: Performance Coaching Membership
consultations.details: Monthly coaching, weekly sessions, and personalized training plans with analytics.
consultations.idealFor: Athletes aiming to elevate their competitive edge with data-driven training.

title: VO2 Max
description: Measure aerobic capacity to enhance endurance and cardiovascular health.

consultations.title: VO2 Max Consultation
consultations.details: VO2 Max test with a detailed report on aerobic capacity and training recommendations.
consultations.idealFor: Endurance athletes looking to improve cardiovascular fitness.

consultations.title: Endurance Training Program
consultations.details: Monthly VO2 Max tests, weekly training sessions, and personalized plans.
consultations.idealFor: Runners, cyclists, or triathletes aiming for high-intensity performance.

title: Lactate Threshold
description: Identify your lactate threshold to fine-tune training intensity and improve endurance.

consultations.title: Lactate Threshold Consultation
consultations.details: Blood lactate testing with a report on training zones and pacing strategies.
consultations.idealFor: Endurance athletes seeking personalized training intensities.

consultations.title: Endurance Training Package
consultations.details: Monthly lactate tests, weekly coaching, and customized endurance plans.
consultations.idealFor: Athletes preparing for marathons or triathlons.

title: Fitness Blood Test
description: Analyze biomarkers to optimize health, nutrition, and training for peak performance.

consultations.title: Blood Test Consultation
consultations.details: Blood sample analysis with personalized health and training recommendations.
consultations.idealFor: Athletes optimizing health and recovery through data-driven insights.

consultations.title: Health Optimization Membership
consultations.details: Monthly blood tests, bi-weekly consultations, and personalized plans.
consultations.idealFor: Individuals committed to long-term health and performance.

title: Radiology
description: Advanced imaging to diagnose musculoskeletal issues with precision.

consultations.title: X-rays
consultations.details: X-ray imaging with a consultation to diagnose bone-related issues.
consultations.idealFor: Individuals with bone pain or injuries.

consultations.title: MRI Scan
consultations.details: High-resolution MRI scan with a consultation for soft-tissue diagnosis.
consultations.idealFor: People with ligament tears or chronic joint pain.

consultations.title: Ultrasound (USG)
consultations.details: Non-invasive ultrasound to assess soft tissue conditions
consultations.idealFor: Anyone needing quick evaluation of joint or muscle issues.

consultations.title: Radiology Monitoring Package
consultations.details: Initial scan, two follow-up sessions, and progress tracking.

title: 3D Posture Lab
description: Analyze movement and alignment to enhance efficiency and prevent injuries.

consultations.title: Posture Analysis Consultation
consultations.details: 3D motion capture analysis with a customized corrective exercise program.
consultations.idealFor: Athletes improving movement efficiency and preventing injuries.

consultations.title: Posture Improvement Program
consultations.details: Monthly assessments, weekly sessions, and corrective exercise plans.
consultations.idealFor: Individuals committed to improving posture and stability.
